description.value:
Trigger You roll a success on a saving throw against an effect that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled].

Your mind retains full awareness despite the best attempts of others, and your focus throws others off-balance. You get a critical success on the triggering saving throw, and if the triggering effect was caused by a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] to you until the end of your next turn.
